Project due

**_\*\*Feel free to contribute your own drafts or assignments, etc. which conform to the scope designated for the weeks indicated. You can remain anonymous by taking out your names._**

**Preview and addressing the questions in groups:**

1.  Form groups and sign up (6 groups in total so mostly 3 per group).
2.  Based on the syllabus, read the assigned materials and pose questions (1-2 good questions/per person) due on Google Form – due every Monday.
3.  I will send a few selected questions to the group.
4.  The group(s): Design activities to engage the class. Interaction with you or between the students is encouraged. Please keep lecture to minimum.

**Final project \[maximum 5 pages\]:**

Write a thoughtful report about **_how_** you write up a study following the sections required: IMRD + LR.

**Title**: Multimodality and language learning

**Introduction**: \[How I will express myself in three moves\]

**Literature Review**: \[How I select studies to include and review, and how I am going to organize them.\]

**Methods**: \[What sub-sections I will include and what information I will include in each sub-section\]

**Results**: \[How I organize my results\]

**Discussion**: \[What I include in my discussion and why\]
